n=input()
import math
for  i in range(0,n):
    a=raw_input().split()
    b=[0 for k in range(0,10)]
    for  j in range(0,10):
        b[j]=int(a[j])
    m=min(b)
    n=b.count(m)
    if b[0]==m and n==1:
        print pow(10,b[0]+1)
    else:
        k= min(b[1:10])
        print str(b[1:10].index(k)+1)*(k+1)
